Finding it hard to focus at school? Have a tough deadline at work? Find yourself wasting time on certain sites? 

If you're in a situation like this then Jailtime is for you. Add a site to the Jailtime blocklist and never worry about going on there again. A blocked page will show up, reminding you that you still have important tasks to do.

Block websites and keep your focus with Jailtime! - The website blocker that helps you move forward in life! No site will be stealing your productivity again.
